name: Alliance Fund Managers
overview: Alliance Fund Managers is an experienced fund manager with funds under management totalling around Â£149m. Currently, AFM manages the Northwest Small Loans for Business Investment Fund on Merseyside which provides loans from Â£3k to Â£50k to to SMEs, including limited companies, sole traders and partnerships. We can provide stand alone finance or as part of a package with banks and other funding providers such as invoice discounters. The product now also includes the retail sector. AFM also manages the entire investment portfolio for Merseyside Special Investment Fundâ€™s Group of Funds â€“ which was one of the largest regional funds in the UK. The portfolio includes a wide range of businesses from large SMEs with multi million turnovers to small businesses run by sole traders and covers a diverse range of sectors. AFM is actively seeking out new opportunities to manage additional funds throughout the UK.
